title: Life Makeover
subTitle: Simulation/Lifestyle/Dress-up/Casual
desc:
Cross-Platform Brilliance
—Every detail of beauty deserves close appreciation.
Experience seamless gameplay across different platforms with stunning 4K graphics. Immerse yourself in a world where every beautiful detail shines, from advanced hair and fabric rendering to dynamic weather systems. Invite your besties to explore and interact in your personalized haven!
Next-Gen Character Customization
—127 new facial customization options ready to level up your natural beauty.
Sculpt the perfect look from forehead to chin, eyebrows to lips. Fine tune details in a larger and freer range. Your dream face is just a touch away!
Infinite Palette, Your Digital Wardrobe
—Unlock "infinity" for your digital wardrobe and RBG palette.
Transform your cyber closet with unlimited dyeing options. From dresses to lace trims, customize every piece with RGB precision. Color and style fashions from 3-star tier to 6-star tier. Unlock breathtaking color-shifting effects and bring your fashion fantasies to life with X Palette and X Starlight!
Design Your Own Fashion
—Become the chief designer of your own brand studio.
Select fabrics, adjust patterns, and create exclusive prints. Experience the thrill of bringing your designs from sketch to runway-ready reality.
Enhanced Photo-Shooting Experience
Capture your style with our upgraded photo system. Enjoy freed camera movement, advanced editing tools, and the freedom to showcase your creations from every angle with any form of composition. Savor the shiny world with an eye for uniqueness and passion!
Home Build 2.0: Advanced and Freed
—Advanced Build mode and building block module.
Build your dream space with our grid-free placement system. Stack furniture, adjust heights, and rotate items at will. Plus, use our new building blocks with 144 color options to construct fantastical structures!
Lifelike Pet Companions
Immerse yourself in ultra-realistic pet interactions. Feel the softness of a kitten's fur or gaze into a puppy's soulful eyes. Capture the fluffy cuteness firsthand and with no filter! Our highly free pet customization and AI-driven genetics system ensure each pet is uniquely yours.
Bring All Freedom-lovers Together
Share your creations, gather aesthetic inspiration, and connect with friends in Vvanna Community. Host virtual gatherings to catch up with your long-missed friends. Visit each other, cook dishes, decorate rooms, and save unforgettable memories into your group photos.
A place of endless possibilities for every girl, Life Makeover endorses every dream and ignites every potential!
Follow our official social platform accounts for more information:
Official Website: https://lifemakeovermysg.archosaur.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LifeMakeoverMYSG
WhatsApp: https://chat.whatsapp.com/LV92xvefohQ93dZpnfwBFT
